articles.description: The Portuguese star, 37, scored 24 goals during the first season of his second stint at United but everything is set to change with the arrival of the Dutch coach this summer.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo 'wants to leave Manchester United this summer' because he reportedly doesn't feel part of Erik ten Hag's project at Old Trafford.
